message: Funny how Ford calls themselves an American company and yet their founder was a supporter of and provided vehicles to the Nazi Party during WWII. I would support, strongly, any referendum to boycott companies that take their jobs to Mexico (i.e., Ford, Carrier, Nabisco, etc...).
